com.qualcomm.toq.smartwatch.api.v1.deckofcards.remote.RemoteDeckOfCardsException

Packages that use RemoteDeckOfCardsException
com.qualcomm.toq.smartwatch.api.v1.deckofcards.remote Contains the classes required to interact with the remote Toq app's API service. 
 

Uses of RemoteDeckOfCardsException in com.qualcomm.toq.smartwatch.api.v1.deckofcards.remote
 

Methods in com.qualcomm.toq.smartwatch.api.v1.deckofcards.remote that throw RemoteDeckOfCardsException
 void DeckOfCardsManager.connect()
          Connect to the Toq app's API service.
 void DeckOfCardsManager.installDeckOfCards(RemoteDeckOfCards deckOfCards)
          Sends the deck of cards to the Toq app service, which in turn will install the deck of cards applet with a default launcher icon on the home screen of the Toq smartwatch.
 void DeckOfCardsManager.installDeckOfCards(RemoteDeckOfCards deckOfCards, RemoteResourceStore resourceStore)
          Sends the deck of cards to the Toq app service, which in turn will install the deck of cards applet with the appropriate launcher icon on the home screen of the Toq smartwatch.
 boolean DeckOfCardsManager.isInstalled()
          Returns a boolean indicating whether the deck of cards applet is installed on the Toq smartwatch.
 boolean DeckOfCardsManager.isToqWatchConnected()
          Returns a boolean indicating whether the Toq smartwatch is connected to the Toq app.
 void DeckOfCardsManager.sendNotification(RemoteToqNotification notification)
          Sends the Toq notification to the Toq app, which in turn will forward the notification to the Toq smartwatch.
 void DeckOfCardsManager.uninstallDeckOfCards()
          Instructs the Toq app to uninstall the deck of cards applet from the Toq smartwatch.
 void DeckOfCardsManager.updateDeckOfCards(RemoteDeckOfCards deckOfCards)
          Sends the updated deck of cards to the Toq app service, which in turn will update the deck of cards app on the Toq smartwatch.
 void DeckOfCardsManager.updateDeckOfCards(RemoteDeckOfCards deckOfCards, RemoteResourceStore resourceStore)
          Sends the updated deck of cards to the Toq app service, which in turn will update the deck of cards app on the Toq smartwatch.
